com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.robot

Interface RobotInstruction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RobotInstructionControlBlockForever, RobotInstructionControlBlockRepeat, RobotInstructionMove, RobotInstructionSpecialInstruction, RobotInstructionTravel

    public interface RobotInstruction
    Base class for instructions in a robot program. Instructions should closely mirror Scratch. - wait for signal X - send signal Y - move to position - send custom instruction to robot - loop over sub-instructions - branch condition - etc...
    Author:
    danroyer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeBackward(float dt)
      run this instruction backward in time
      void executeForward(float dt)
      run this instruction forward in time
      JComponent getIcon()

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()

      • getIcon

        JComponent getIcon()
        Returns:
        A GUI element to put in a timeline (devoid of control parameters)

      • getPanel

        JPanel getPanel()
        Returns:
        a panel with control parameters to tweak this instruction.

      • render

        void render(com.jogamp.opengl.GL2 gl2)
        visualize the instruction's in 3D
        Parameters:
        gl2 - the render context

      • executeForward

        void executeForward(float dt)
        run this instruction forward in time
        Parameters:
        dt - how far to run this instruction in time

      • executeBackward

        void executeBackward(float dt)
        run this instruction backward in time
        Parameters:
        dt - how far to run this instruction in time

      • getProgress

        float getProgress()
        Returns:
        0..1 how done is this instruction?
